content: chibi spiderman crochet pattern pattern by *brinady* this is a free pattern you may share it freely and sell the items you make please do not sell the pattern it is a free pattern materials needed medium weight red yarn medium weight blue yarn black and white felt black yarn or embroidery thread small amount 4mm crochet hook yarn needle stuffing hot glue abbreviations st- stitches increase- increase single_crochet- single_crochet decrease- decrease f/o- finish off head in red 1 magic_ring with 6st 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4 2sc increase around 24 5 3sc increase around 30 6-11 single_crochet around 6 rounds 30 12 3sc decrease around 24 13 2sc decrease around 18 14 single_crochet decrease around 12 <time to stuff it> 15 decrease around 6 f/o and leave a tail leave the circle open and sew it onto the top of the body once it is finished body in red and blue 1 staring in red magic_ring with 6st 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4 2sc increase around 24 <change to blue> 5 3sc increase 2sc <change to red> single_crochet increase 2sc <change to blue> single_crochet increase 3sc increase three times 30 6 skip 5 st 2sc <change to red> 5sc <change to blue> 2sc skip 5 st 11sc 20 7 2sc <change to red> 5sc <change to blue> 13sc 20 8 repeat round 7 20 <change to red> 9 single_crochet around 20 <change to blue> 10-11 single_crochet around 2 rounds 20 <continue to leg#1> leg #1 in blue and red <continue from body> 1 5sc skip 10 st 5sc 10 2-3 single_crochet around 2 rounds 10 <change to red> 4-5 single_crochet around 2 rounds 10 ***recommend stuffing the body and leg at around this point*** 6 decrease around 5 f/o and leave a tail do any final stuffing of the leg sew the circle closed and hide the tail leg #2 in blue and red <attach blue yarn to the crotch> 1 single_crochet around on the 10 st that were skipped at the beginning of leg#1 10 2-3 single_crochet around 2 rounds 10 <change to red> 4-5 single_crochet around 2 rounds 10 <stuff the leg> 6 decrease around 5 f/o and leave a tail do any final stuffing of the leg sew the circle closed and hide the tail arm do this twice blue and red <attach blue yarn to the armpit> 1 single_crochet around the arm hole adding an extra stitch at the beginning and end of the round 7 2-3 single_crochet around 2 rounds 7 <change to red> 4-5 single_crochet around 2 rounds 7 f/o and sew the circle closed then hide the tail eyes cut two identical leaf shapes out of white felt hot glue them on to black felt cut the black felt to create an even border glue these eyes into place on the head spider embroidery using thin black yarn or embroidery thread embroider a spider onto the chest this sketch shows
